ygData.subject: RE: warhammer of divine grace
ygData.msgSnippet: If you want an easy game, go play PacMan. ... From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela1@mindspring.com] Sent: 1999/09/17 8:56 PM To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
If you want an easy game, go play PacMan.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mikaela [mailto:mikaela1@...]
Sent: 1999/09/17 8:56 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] warhammer of divine grace


From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>

Can you say "Dream On?"

Typical Verant. They put the cleric only weapon on a DRAGON that it takes
like 5 or 6 full high level groups to take down. Not to mention that any
such party who DOES manage to kill one of the dragons will more than likely
have at least 4 or 5 clerics in it, only one of which gets to loot the
weapon.

I'm certainly not holding my breath for getting this weapon any time soon.

Mik
